Class JSONTools

public class JSONTools

Description: Methods to work with JSON strings References:

Changes

04/22/2017 Initial version. 05/07/2017 Make sure given path and tag exist in JSON, otherwise returning null. 05/21/2017 Nest the JSON fields as a new object with a higher hierarchy level. 04/19/2021 JSONRecord: New methods put(), serialize() so now this class could be used to create json files as well. 09/11/2021 Class MappingField moved from main class IntegrationDataTools.
